plot: A strange love story based on political background about the 1961 Syrian-Egyptian's union breaking apart while surreal dreams judge facts and realities of civil values awakened by despotism of both rulers and ruled.
title: Makaad fi al-hadika
plot_es: A strange love story based on political background about the 1961 Syrian-Egyptian's union breaking apart while surreal dreams judge facts and realities of civil values awakened by despotism of both rulers and ruled.
plot_en: A strange love story based on political background about the 1961 Syrian-Egyptian's union breaking apart while surreal dreams judge facts and realities of civil values awakened by despotism of both rulers and ruled.
